repnme.cdata!:
Iran - Sixth Industrial and Mining
            Development Bank of Iran Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial and Mining Development
            Bank of Iran Project will assist IMDBI in financing the
            foreign exchange cost of industrial projects in the private
            sector, mainly in manufacturing.
